Name: Krystals with A K
About the game: Welcome to Krystals the game. A relaxing construction game about mining an industrial quantity of crystal gems. Use those gems to build new buildings and combine those gems to unlock even more buildings. These new buildings will increase your production and the complexity of your ever growing factory.
